name: Clash Cards
description:
Clash Cards is a competitive card battler game for the Playdate. Fight for control of the board by battling against your opponent's cards. Whoever controls the most cards after everything has been played is the winner!

Features:
  • Quickplay mode with a random or saved deck
  • Deck drafting tournament mode
  • Deck builder
  • 40 unique cards
Demo:

The free demo of Clash Cards gives you access to the quickplay mode and a smaller amount of cards.

How to Install the Game

Not sure how to sideload games onto your Playdate? Panic has you covered with these instructions.

Credits

Programming, art and music by Darcy Hatfield

DC Monster Pack by Corwin ZX
